front.title: Controlling FLUTE sessions with Real-Time Streaming Protocol (RTSP)

abstract.t: File Delivery over Unidirectional Transport (FLUTE) is defined in RFC 3926 and provide an extensible framework for delivering any type of files over UDP. FLUTE is mostly intended for IP multicast comminication, but the use with IP unicast is not excluded. Real- time Streaming Protocol (RTSP) allow the play-out of media packets to multicast and unicast sessions.
